title: Rice sales via Sathosa & Co-Op
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Minister of Agriculture Mahinda Amaraweera said that steps have been taken to sell the stocks of rice owned by the Paddy Marketing Board through Sathosa, Co-operatives, and supermarkets.
Minister Amaraweera said that the distribution of stocks of rice for sale through the aforementioned establishments is underway.
